u.a: stands up and looks at snack
<aft> puts some snack back in bag
<aft> reaches into bag . eats . hands bag to Mother
<aft> looks at Mother . looks at Investigator
<1w> takes bag . moves on couch so Rick can sit .
<1w> leans forward and touches Rick's back
<1w> glances at camera . looks at Rick
<bef> looks at Investigator . glances at camera
<bef> reaches toward bag . puts pretzels back .
turns to Mother . gets up and runs into next room .
points to light switch near door . stretches to switch
<aft> climbs onto chair and switches light .
<1w> climbs off chair . knocks off coat .
